protective_factors: Identifies family (husband, children) as strong deterrents against self-harm ('I couldn't do that to them')
Explicit denial of intent or plan
Engaged in treatment and willing to try dose increase
risk_factors: Presence of passive death ideation ('wish I could disappear')
clinical_actions: Psychoeducation provided regarding passive ideation vs. active risk.
Implement medication titration (*Sertraline* increase to 100mg) which warrants increased surveillance.
Follow-up scheduled to monitor for emergent active ideation post-medication change.
